amendment.description: To modify the provision relating to the Bonneville Power Administration Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 34 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 34 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Craig. (consideration: CR S1431-1433; text: CR S1433) To modify the provision relating to the Bonneville Power Administration Fund.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 34 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
